type.description: Default value for `type` property which renders the template.

color.description: Text color for the cta. Defaults to the lightest theme color.
Background color for the cta. Defaults to the darkest theme color.

gap.description: The space between the text and the icon.

block.description: Padding space above and below. Equal values in the block axis.

inline.description: Padding space left and right. Equal values in the inline axis.

color.description: Border color for the cta. Inherits the cta background color.

message.description: The value for the `loading` attribute. Default is `Loading...`.

name.description: The name for the icon displayed during the `loading` state.

color.description: Background color of the cta during the `loading` state.
Border color of the cta during the `loading` state.

position.description: Position of the icon. Valid values: `start`, `end`.

family.description: The font family used for cta. Defaults to sans-serif.

color.description: Background color of the cta during the `hover` state.
Border color of the cta during the `hover` state.
Outline color of the cta during the `focus` state.
Background color of the cta during the `active` state.
Border color of the cta during the `active` state.
Background color of the cta for the `disabled` state.
Border color of the cta for the `disabled` state.
